headline: American Tower Corporation Announces Election of Gene Reilly to Board of Directors
summary: BOSTON, August 25, 2025--American Tower Corporation (NYSE: AMT) announced that its Board of Directors has elected Gene Reilly as a director.

headline: IYR: Betting On REITs' Recovery
summary: IYR offers a balanced REIT portfolio with exposure to megatrends and defensive assets, supported by improving macro conditions. Learn why IYR ETF is a buy.
